name: Rogule
description:
A fresh dungeon each day with one chance to win!

👉 rogule.com 👈

Use the arrow keys to move.

Move over items and  monsters to interact.

Collect all the  items.

Get to the shrine  to ascend and win the game.

Note to reviewers: if you want to do multiple runs for testing you can append a querystring to the URL like game.html?hello to generate a new dungeon (also note that "hello" itself is a particularly difficult dungeon lol).

Get more awesome games from the punk collective.
